title: Matthew A. Turner, PhD
text:
Reducing uncertainty in high-stakes decisions

I help organizations reduce uncertainty when designing campaigns and programs that aim to shape behavior and beliefs. I work in partnership with clients who know how risky it feels to commit limited resources to high-stakes outreach, building confidence by testing and comparing strategies through scientific modeling before spending a dime. Drawing on broad computational experience, I also support execution and coordinate with technical vendors so good strategy survives contact with reality.

This site outlines my work in applied decision support, research, and education, and connects to SubtleTea Solutions, where I develop and deliver related products and services. My work brings research-grade rigor to real decision environments.

title: SubtleTea Solutions, LLC
text:
I founded SubtleTea Solutions, LLC to help organizations—large and small—plan social change campaigns with greater clarity and confidence, especially when the costs of getting it wrong are high. We support decisions about how messages, products, and practices spread through social networks, both in person and online. When useful, we also help our clients choose and apply the right computational tools for the problem at hand. Sometimes that means advanced modeling or AI; other times, carefully structured analysis in Excel is far more effective.
SubtleTea Solutions provides multi-tiered services to develop social science intelligence for organizations. Engagements begin with a focused consultation to understand client needs and aspirations. Our ideal clients are those we can grow with: we aim to deliver immediate insight while creating the conditions for strategies to evolve through continuous feedback about what works, what doesn’t, and why.

title: SubtleTea Solutions, LLC
text:
Research
SubtleTea Research provides the logical, mathematical, computational, and conceptual backbone for all SubtleTea Solutions products. This work supports open-source projects, internal tool development, and longer-horizon research that informs applied strategy.
SubtleTea Research also engages selectively in developing new, research-driven applications of social science to business, political, and sustainability challenges. If you are exploring a research product or idea and want to assess whether it may be a good fit for collaboration, please reach out at matt@mat.phd.

title: SubtleTea Solutions, LLC
text:
Intelligence
SubtleTea Intelligence products provide actionable insight into social change by applying our award-winning research in social and cognitive science to real-world decisions about how best to allocate resources in marketing, educational, or other intervention campaigns—before those resources are committed. The emphasis is on reducing uncertainty and making the range of possible outcomes explicit, eliminating guesswork.

title: SubtleTea Solutions, LLC
text:
Education
SubtleTea Education supports individuals and teams in developing their own customized intelligence capabilities. This includes tailored course design, instruction, and workshops grounded in the same analytical approaches used in our applied work.
